import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./TodoApp.css";// import css file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoApp(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const[text,setText]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://todo-backend-samo.onrender.com/todos").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setTodos(data));},[]);const addTodo=()=>{if(!text)return;fetch("https://todo-backend-samo.onrender.com/todos",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({text})}).then(res=>res.json()).then(newTodo=>setTodos([...todos,newTodo]));setText("");};const toggleComplete=(id,completed)=>{fetch("https://todo-backend-samo.onrender.com/todos/".concat(id),{method:"PUT",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({completed})}).then(res=>res.json()).then(updatedTodo=>{setTodos(todos.map(t=>t._id===id?updatedTodo:t));});};const deleteTodo=id=>{fetch("https://todo-backend-samo.onrender.com/todos/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(()=>setTodos(todos.filter(t=>t._id!==id)));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83C\uDF1F My Todo List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter a new todo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addTodo,children:"\u2795 Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:todo.completed?"completed":"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:todo.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>toggleComplete(todo._id,!todo.completed),children:todo.completed?"â†© Undo":"âœ” Done"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete",onClick:()=>deleteTodo(todo._id),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1 Delete"})]})]},todo._id))})]})});}export default TodoApp;
